scriptedEmail.name: Article Comment Notifications
scriptedEmail.description: Raises notifications to users subscribed to new comments added to an Article.
scriptedEmail.bodyScript:
#set($authorUrl = false) #set($authorUrl = $context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.Url) #if ($authorUrl)
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.AvatarUrl, 32, 32, "%{ ResizeMethod='ScaleDown', ScaleFactor=2, OutputIsPersisted='True', width='32', height='32' }")
#else
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.AvatarUrl, 32, 32, "%{ ResizeMethod='ScaleDown', ScaleFactor=2, OutputIsPersisted='True', width='32', height='32' }")
#end 		#if ($authorUrl) $context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.DisplayName #else $context_v1_email.Context.Comment.User.DisplayName #end
$context_v1_email.Context.Comment.Body('Email')
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body">New comment on {content_name_link}</resource> <resource name="Footer">{reportabuse_link}.</resource> <resource name="ReportAbuse">Flag as spam/abuse</resource> <resource name="Subject">{site_name}: Comment on {content_name}</resource> </language>
